contents: 1. leaves 4b-9a: Maʻāhid al-jamʻ fī mashāhid al-samʻ.
2. leaves 9b-15b: al-Jawharah al-muḍīʼah fī tajwīz iḍāfat al-jāzim ʻalá al-mashīʼah.
3. leaves 16a-19b: Tarkīb al-ṣuwar wa-tartīb al-suwar.
4. leaves 20a-24b: Akhbār al-akhyār.
5. leaves 25a-26b: al-Jawāb al-ajall ʻan ḥikmat kurab al-Muṣṭafá ʻinda ḥulūl al-ajal.
6. leaves 26b-28a: al-Fatḥ al-mubīn bi-jawāb baʻḍ al-sāʼilīn.
7. leaves 28b-34b: ʻAqīlat al-ḥadhir wa-ʻaqīdat al-sirr.
8. leaves 35a-38a: Hidāyat al-murīd lil-sabīl al-ḥamīd.
9. leaves 38b-40a: al-Risālah al-murshidah.
10. leaves 40b-42a: al-Naṣīḥah.
11. leaves 42b-43b: al-Naṣīḥah al-mawḍūʻah lil-shaykh Manṣūr.
12. leaves 44a-46a: al-Risālah al-Nāṣirīyah.
13. leaves 46a-50b: Nubdhah fī al-kalām ʻalá āyat al-Isrāʼ.
14. leaves 51a-54b: Nubdhah fī al-kalām ʻalá āyat al-Dukhān.
15. leaves 54b-60a: Nubdhah fī faḍl laylat niṣf Shaʻbān.
16. leaves 60b-83a: Lawāmiʻ al-anwār wa jawāmiʻ al-asrār / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Bakrī [1493 or 1494-1545 or 1546].
17. leaves 83a-83b: Jawāb suʼāl fī maʻná lafẓ "al-ridā" fī qaṣīdat ʻAlī ibn Abī al-Wafāʼ.
18. leaves 83b-97a: Tanbīh al-awāh li-faḍl lā ilāha illā Allāh / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Bakrī [1493 or 1494-1545 or 1546].
19. leaves 97b-100b: al-Iqtiṣād fī bayān marātib al-ījtihād.
20. leaves 100b-101b: Jawāb al-ustādh fī suʼāl warada ʻalayhi fī al-kamāl min ahl Allāh / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Bakrī [1493 or 1494-1545 or 1546].
21. leaves 102a-106b: Ṣādiḥat al-azal wa-nāṭiqat al-abad.
22. leaves 106b-111b: Taʼbīd al-minnah fī taʼyīd al-sunnah.
23. leaves 112a-123a: al-Risālah al-nāfiʻah.
24. leaves 123b-126a: Aysar maṭlūb fī ziyārat akbar maḥbūb.
25. leaves 126b-129b: al-Nuṣrah al-ilāhīyah lil-ṭāʼifah al-Saʻdīyah.
26. leaves 130a-131b: Jawāb ʻan suʼāl hal aṭlaʻa Allāh ḥabībahu Muḥammad ʻalá sāʼir maʻlūmātihi.
27. leaves 132a-134b: al-Sirr al-maktūm wa-al-durr al-manẓūm.
28. leaves 134b-137a: Ṣīghat al-ṣalāh waradat ʻalá al-musṭāf / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Bakrī [1493 or 1494-1545 or 1546].
29. leaves 137b-139b: Tuḥfat al-sālik li-ashraf al-masālik.
30. leaves 139b-141a: Nubdhah fī aqsām al-bidaʻ wa-al-kalām ʻalayhā.
31. leaves 144a-145a: Waṣīyah.
32. leaves 145a-146a: al-Mudhakkirah.
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
